text:
“Sim, eu serei bom para você, sim...” Ele assobiou enquanto massageava seu pênis, parecia.
Penelope leu sobre anatomia e estar perto dos meninos de Bridgerton crescendo, ela é obrigada a ver grandes diferenças entre os corpos de mulheres e homens. No entanto, Penelope não conseguia entender muito bem o que ele estava fazendo, mas isso a fez se sentir quente de repente.
Benedict tinha suas costas inclinadas de uma certa maneira, seu rosto contorcido de dor, e isso também era prazer?
“Minha linda, Vaga-lume. Sim, aperte-me com suas lindas coxas, eu vou fazer um santuário para essas suas deliciosas coxas!” Ele gritou enquanto Penelope sentia suas próprias coxas se apertando uma contra a outra.
trans:
"Yes, I’ll be good to you, yes..." He whispered as he stroked his penis, it seemed.
Penelope had read about anatomy, and growing up around the Bridgerton boys, she was bound to notice the significant differences between male and female bodies. Still, Penelope couldn’t quite understand what he was doing, though it suddenly made her feel warm.
Benedict had his back arched a certain way, his face twisted in pain—and was that pleasure too?
"My beautiful Firefly. Yes, squeeze me with those lovely thighs of yours. I’ll build a shrine for those delicious thighs of yours!" He cried out as Penelope felt her own thighs pressing tightly against each other.
